statements: UPDATE public_opinion_surveys SET survey_name = 'Education Survey', survey_topic = 'Education', survey_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE survey_id = 1;

UPDATE public_opinion_surveys SET response = 'Good' WHERE survey_id = 1
UPDATE public_opinion_surveys SET respondent_age = 30, respondent_gender = 'Female' WHERE survey_name = 'Politics Survey'
UPDATE Surveys SET total_responses = total_responses + 1 WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE PollResults SET respondent_name = 'John Doe', response_date = '2022-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE poll_id = 1;
UPDATE Surveys SET total_responses = total_responses + 1 WHERE survey_topic = 'Customer Satisfaction';
UPDATE PollResults SET response_date = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice' AND survey_id = 1;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_name = 'Customer Satisfaction Survey' WHERE survey_id = 'f2b5989b-4403-4b61-8802-994d4242d872';
UPDATE responses SET answer = 'Yes' WHERE participant_id = 'acd9021a-ce7c-4c85-9b65-35962c67d8a4' AND survey_id = 'f2b5989b-4403-4b61-8802-994d4242d872';
UPDATE surveys SET survey_date = '2021-08-24' WHERE survey_name = 'Customer Satisfaction Survey';
UPDATE responses SET answer = 'Agree' WHERE question = 'How likely are you to recommend our products?';
UPDATE SurveyParticipants SET location='New York' WHERE participant_id=1

UPDATE SurveyParticipants SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith';
